price: So leave them to indulge in falsehood and amuse themselves until they meet their Day that they are promised.
arabic: فَذَرۡهُمۡ يَخُوضُواْ وَيَلۡعَبُواْ حَتَّىٰ يُلَٰقُواْ يَوۡمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِي يُوعَدُونَ
